ProductCategoryQualification.name: ProductCategoryQualification
ProductCategoryQualification.description: Represents qualification rules for product categories. The rules determine when the product category qualifies to be displayed to users.

CategoryId.description: The product category associated with the category qualification record.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date from which the qualification rule for the product category comes into effect.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date to which the qualification rule for the product category ceases to be in effect.

IsQualified.description: Indicates whether the product category is qualified (true) or not (false) based on the qualification rules.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the product category qualification record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the product category qualification record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the product category qualification record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the product category qualification record.

ProductCategoryQualification.accessRules: Product Catalog Management must be enabled to access this object.
